item.description: Father Who Killed Daughter's Alleged Molester Won't Face Charges In Lavaca County, Texas http://t.co/I74tnUiy via @HuffPostCrime
item.content:encoded: Father Who Killed Daughter's Alleged Molester Won't Face Charges In Lavaca County, Texas http://t.co/I74tnUiy via @HuffPostCrime SHINER, Texas — Hearing his 5-year-old daughter crying from behind a barn, a father ran and discovered the unthinkable: A man molesting her. The father pulled the man off his daughter, authorities say, and started pummeling him to death with his fists. Link - Trackbacks
item.dc:creator: huffingtonpost.com
